entity_types.name: Character
entity_types.description: A specific individual person, wizard, ghost, or named being within the universe.

entity_types.name: Location
entity_types.description: A physical place, ranging from specific rooms to buildings, towns, or geographical regions.

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: A group, team, department, or society with a shared purpose or membership.

entity_types.name: Artifact
entity_types.description: A magical object or item of significance.

entity_types.name: Creature
entity_types.description: A non-human magical beast or species instance.

entity_types.name: Spell
entity_types.description: A specific magical incantation, hex, jinx, curse, or charm.

entity_types.name: Potion
entity_types.description: A magical mixture brewed from ingredients.

entity_types.name: Event
entity_types.description: A significant occurrence, meeting, battle, or timeline marker.

entity_types.name: Concept
entity_types.description: Abstract magical laws, ancient magic forms, or cultural constructs.

relationship_types.name: familial_bond
relationship_types.description: Indicates a family relationship (parent, sibling, spouse) between characters.

relationship_types.name: member_of
relationship_types.description: Indicates membership in an organization, house, or team.

relationship_types.name: wields
relationship_types.description: Indicates the possession or usage of an artifact (usually a wand or weapon).

relationship_types.name: located_in
relationship_types.description: Spatial containment of an entity within a location.

relationship_types.name: casts
relationship_types.description: The action of performing a specific spell.

relationship_types.name: brews
relationship_types.description: The action of creating a potion.

relationship_types.name: killed_by
relationship_types.description: Indicates the cause of death for a character.

relationship_types.name: creator_of
relationship_types.description: The act of inventing a spell, potion, or artifact.
